description: This source file implements platform-dependent and utility functions for the Slap Sco Collection Object, including the creation function 'SlapCreateScoCollection'. It is part of the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP) in a BroadWay Service Delivery System, authored by Xuechen Yang. The main functionality provided is the creation of a new Sco Collection object via the 'SlapCreateScoCollection' function.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapCreateScoCollection(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and returns a handle to a new Slap Sco Collection object, taking container, owner, and reserved contexts as parameters.
